body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack test cmd/compiler_command.py
==================================================================== test session starts ====================================================================
platform darwin -- Python 3.7.3, pytest-3.2.5, py-1.4.34, pluggy-0.4.0
rootdir: /Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/spack/test, inifile: pytest.ini
collected 2101 items                                                                                                                                         

cmd/compiler_command.py .

================================================================= slowest 20 test durations =================================================================
0.34s call     cmd/compiler_command.py::test_compiler_find_without_paths
0.11s setup    cmd/compiler_command.py::test_compiler_find_without_paths
0.01s teardown cmd/compiler_command.py::test_compiler_find_without_paths
===================================================================== warnings summary ======================================================================
cmd/compiler_command.py::test_compiler_find_without_paths
  /Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/cpu/detect.py:127: UserWarning: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'sysctl': 'sysctl'
    warnings.warn(str(e))
  /Users/Adam/spack/lib/spack/llnl/util/cpu/detect.py:127: UserWarning: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: 'sysctl': 'sysctl'
    warnings.warn(str(e))

-- Docs: http://doc.pytest.org/en/latest/warnings.html
=================================================================== 2100 tests deselected ===================================================================
=================================================== 1 passed, 2100 deselected, 2 warnings in 3.60 seconds ===================================================
```

### Information on your system

- macOS 10.15 Catalina

@alalazo
title: spack test lists warnings about sysctl on macOS
